game.name: DENGEKI BACHI BACHI
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A retro-inspired top-down action game where a single mistake means instant danger. Overcome 30 relentless stages and prove a love torn apart by a spirit’s mischief.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A retro-inspired top-down action game where a single mistake means instant danger. Overcome 30 relentless stages and prove a love torn apart by a spirit’s mischief.
